channel.title: Dragon Dagger[Delta]
channel.description:
[code=java]if((id == 1215 || id == 1231 || id == 5680 || id == 5698 || id == 8000 || id == 8001 || id = 8002) && FightType != 3)[/code] I tried to tamper with my Dds code and add in another three.
But whenever i compile this i get an error
[code=java]client.java:3070: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,int if((id == 1215 || id == 1231 || id == 5680 || id == 5698 || id == 8000 || id == 8001 || id = 8002) && FightType == 3)[/code]
I've tried to fix it, but almost everything i do it just gets another error
